deity_markdown: [Balumbdar](/Deities.aspx?ID=674), [Baphomet](/Deities.aspx?ID=427), [Dolok Darkfur](/Deities.aspx?ID=606), [Gorum](/Deities.aspx?ID=283), [Iomedae](/Deities.aspx?ID=285), [Keepers of the Hearth](/Deities.aspx?ID=248), [Kostchtchie](/Deities.aspx?ID=77), [Kurgess](/Deities.aspx?ID=351), [Rovagug](/Deities.aspx?ID=291), [The Laborer's Bastion](/Deities.aspx?ID=253), [Vineshvakhi](/Deities.aspx?ID=622)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Enlarge](/Spells.aspx?ID=1514)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 329 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodline**
[Demonic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=21)

**Deities**
[Balumbdar](/Deities.aspx?ID=674), [Baphomet](/Deities.aspx?ID=427), [Dolok Darkfur](/Deities.aspx?ID=606), [Gorum](/Deities.aspx?ID=283), [Iomedae](/Deities.aspx?ID=285), [Keepers of the Hearth](/Deities.aspx?ID=248), [Kostchtchie](/Deities.aspx?ID=77), [Kurgess](/Deities.aspx?ID=351), [Rovagug](/Deities.aspx?ID=291), [The Laborer's Bastion](/Deities.aspx?ID=253), [Vineshvakhi](/Deities.aspx?ID=622)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

Bolstered by magical power, the target grows to size Large. Its equipment grows with it but returns to natural size if removed. The creature is [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3). Its [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if it started out Tiny), and it gains a +2 status bonus to melee damage. This spell has no effect on a Large or larger creature.

---
**Heightened (4th)** The creature instead grows to size Huge. The status bonus to melee damage is +4 and the creature's reach increases by 10 feet (or 15 feet if the creature started out Tiny). The spell has no effect on a Huge or larger creature.

**Heightened (6th)** Choose either the 2nd-rank or 4th-rank version of this spell and apply its effects to up to 10 willing creatures.
name: Enlarge

**Deities**

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Cause a creature to grow in size.
</summary>
summary: Cause a creature to grow in size.
summary_markdown: Cause a creature to grow in size.

Its equipment grows with it but returns to natural size if removed. The creature is clumsy 1. Its reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if it started out Tiny), and it gains a +2 status bonus to melee damage. This spell has no effect on a Large or larger creature. --- Heightened (4th) The creature instead grows to size Huge. The status bonus to melee damage is +4 and the creature's reach increases by 10 feet (or 15 feet if the creature started out Tiny). The spell has no effect on a Huge or larger creature. Heightened (6th) Choose either the 2nd-rank or 4th-rank version of this spell and apply its effects to up to 10 willing creatures.
